title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) for the checked state of the table to update. Additionally, a busy cursor should be shown during this process.
EB: The checked state of the table should update quickly, ideally without any noticeable delay. The user should also see a busy cursor indicating that the update process is ongoing.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Update the checked state of the checkboxes.
3. Observe the time it takes for the checkbox state to update and check if a busy cursor is displayed during this process.
